name: connecXCare
0:
”Alexa ask connecX care for assistance”
”Alexa ask connecX care for the news”
”Alexa ask connecX care for the menu”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: connecx care
des:
This skill connects Alexa with the connecX aged care platform to provide voice assistance.

Notice: To use this Skill you need to have an active connecX account.

connecX provides:
 - Staff call
 - Building News
